name: Tanks (itch) (Arc676)
description:
Tanks is a combat game based on the Flash game of the same name. It used to be hosted on 2dplay.com, but it appears to no longer be available there. You can find the original game by simply searching "Tanks flash game."

Between 2 and 4 players (any number of computer controlled players) control tanks and must destroy the others to earn money to purchase upgrades and better weapons. The game can be played indefinitely and you can save tank data to disk to resume at a later date.

Project available under GPLv3. See the GitHub repository for more details.
